headline: Marinated Chickpeas
name: Marinated Chickpeas
description: Chickpeas are tossed in a lemony olive oil dressing with fresh herbs into this easy, Mediterrenean-inspired marinated chickpea recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas in a bowl. Add olive oil, oregano, lemon juice, lemon zest, parsley, garlic, and sea salt and mix well. Marinate chickpeas in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight.
